<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/board-meeting/pending-feedback"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get board meetings pending T+7 or T+30 feedback.

Returns list of meetings that need feedback, sorted by urgency.
Used by n8n to send Telegram reminders.

  parameters={undefined}
>
